verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> year שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> In the seventh לְיֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> of Jehu מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> began to reign יְהוֹאָ֔שׁ <S%H3060><s%> Jehoash וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> and forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> he in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's צִבְיָ֖ה <S%H6645><s%> [was] Zibiah מִבְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> of Beersheba

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוֹאָ֧שׁ <S%H3060><s%> And Jehoash הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמָ֑יו <S%H3117><s%> all his days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הוֹרָ֔הוּ <S%H3384><s%> instructed יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <S%H3077><s%> wherein Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> But the high places לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not סָ֑רוּ <S%H5493><s%> were not taken away ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> still sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1116><s%> in the high places

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <S%H3060><s%> And Jehoash אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> to the priests כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> All כֶּ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> All the money הַקֳּדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H6944><s%> of the dedicated things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יוּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> that is brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [even] the money עוֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> that passeth אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of every one כֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [the account] the money נַפְשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> that every man עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H6187><s%> is set at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [and] all the money אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> that cometh עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and לֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> into any man's לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> to bring בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

יִקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> take לָהֶם֙ הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> Let the priests אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [it] to them every man מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> מַכָּר֑וֹ <S%H4378><s%> of his acquaintance וְהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יְחַזְּקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> and let them repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> the breaches הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> shall be found שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> any בָּֽדֶק׃ <S%H919><s%> wheresoever any breach פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וְשָׁלֹ֛שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יְהוֹאָ֑שׁ <S%H3060><s%> Jehoash לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not חִזְּק֥וּ <S%H2388><s%> had not repaired הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> called הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then king יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <S%H3060><s%> Jehoash לִיהוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3077><s%> for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> and the [other] priests וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why אֵינְכֶ֥ם <S%H369><s%> not מְחַזְּקִ֖ים <S%H2388><s%> unto them Why repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> ye not the breaches הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> henceforth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תִּקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> take כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> no [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> מַכָּֽרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4378><s%> of your acquaintance כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְבֶ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> it for the breaches הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house תִּתְּנֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> but deliver

וַיֵּאֹ֖תוּ <S%H225><s%> consented הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> no קְחַת־ <S%H3947><s%> to receive כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> [more] money מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וּלְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> neither חַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3077><s%> But Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> chest אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> a וַיִּקֹּ֥ב <S%H5344><s%> and bored חֹ֖ר <S%H2356><s%> a hole בְּדַלְתּ֑וֹ <S%H1817><s%> in the lid וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> of it and set אֹתוֹ֩ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֨צֶל <S%H681><s%> it beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar [בַּיָּמִין כ] (מִיָּמִ֗ין <S%H3225><s%> left-handed ק) בְּבֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> cometh אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> as one בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְנָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> put שָׁ֤מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <S%H8104><s%> that kept הַסַּ֔ף <S%H5592><s%> the door אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> therein all the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> [that was] brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> And it was [so] when they saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> there was רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> that [there was] much הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money בָּֽאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> in the chest וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up סֹפֵ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> scribe הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> that the king's וְהַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and the high וַיָּצֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H6696><s%> and they put up in bags וַיִּמְנ֔וּ <S%H4487><s%> and told אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the money הַנִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> that was found בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְנָתְנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> And they gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the money הַֽמְתֻכָּ֔ן <S%H8505><s%> being told עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [יַד כ] (יְדֵי֙ <S%H3027><s%> able ק) עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> of them that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> the work [הַפְּקֻדִים כ] (הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> appoint ק) בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיּוֹצִיאֻ֜הוּ <S%H3318><s%> and they laid it out לְחָרָשֵׁ֤י <S%H2796><s%> artificer הָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> carpenter וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> and builders הָעֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> that wrought בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלַגֹּֽדְרִים֙ <S%H1443><s%> And to masons וּלְחֹצְבֵ֣י <S%H2672><s%> and hewers הָאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <S%H7069><s%> and to buy עֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> and hewed לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֣דֶק <S%H919><s%> the breaches בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּלְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> and for all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and for all that was laid out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> out הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> for the house לְחָזְקָֽה׃ <S%H2394><s%> to repair

אַךְ֩ <S%H389><s%> also לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> were not יֵעָשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> Howbeit there were not made בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD סִפּ֥וֹת <S%H5592><s%> bowls כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of silver מְזַמְּר֤וֹת <S%H4212><s%> snuffers מִזְרָקוֹת֙ <S%H4219><s%> basons חֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <S%H2689><s%> trumpets כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> any vessels זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> or vessels כָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of the money הַמּוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> [that was] brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> did הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> the work יִתְּנֻ֑הוּ <S%H5414><s%> But they gave וְחִזְּקוּ־ <S%H2388><s%> and repaired ב֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> therewith the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> did not יְחַשְּׁב֣וּ <S%H2803><s%> Moreover they reckoned אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> not with the men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose יִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> they delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> the money עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> into whose hand לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> to be bestowed לְעֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> for they dealt הַמְּלָאכָ֑ה <S%H4399><s%> on workmen כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶאֱמֻנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> faithfully הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> dealt

כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money אָשָׁם֙ <S%H817><s%> The trespass וְכֶ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money חַטָּא֔וֹת <S%H2399><s%> fault לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> was not יוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> was not brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> it was the priests' יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become פ
